text: <@U01E0U2RJJ2>, why not make this a bonafide julia package? We can think of a name that accurately and clearly reflects its usage. Something like `OceananigansComputations.jl` … ? It may not be useful to focus just on `KernelComputedField`; there’s plenty of other computations that might belong. This is partly the purpose of the LESbrary.jl (but it needs more love!) but there are certainly computations that are not specific to “LES” that could belong in a more general package.
